channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- CompactLogix 5380
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- CompactLogix 5380

item.title: CVE-2024-6077|2024-09-12T21:01:50.254Z -- rockwell%20automation -- compactlogix%205380
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the Rockwell Automation affected products when specially crafted packets are sent to the CIP Security Object. If exploited the device will become unavailable and require a factory reset to recover.
